Title: OilspillsReformat

Version: 1.0.0

Author: Jeonghoon Lee

GitHub Link: https://github.com/JohntheLee/OilspillsReformat

A Python script that utilizes ArcPy module to reformat oilspill shapefiles. This script also opens the oilspills shapefile in ArcGIS. The script will reformat certain oilspills attributes.
